授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to understand the historical and contemporary forces shaping urban Canada.
到達目標: The students will learn about the historical evolution of Canadian cities. They will be able to discuss the key forces reshaping Canadian cities in the 21st century.
授業の概要・背景: The course will cover topics on the evolution of Canadian cities. This material will be presented via lectures and reinforced via student discussion.
授業方法: Lecture with some student participation and discussion
